nodes.text: So how was your day?
I went to the Infirmary and saw Moira. She was healing someone at the time, so I didn't say anything. That woman is astounding.
I wrote her this song -

Moira, the Lady of Compassion.
Moira will always be in fashion.

Moira Glenshannon does what she can to make sure everybody gets healed -
That's her appeal.

Angel of Mercy ready to soothe all your sorrows and hardships away -
That's her forte.

Moira Glenshannon,
You're all that I can see.
Moira Glenshannon,
Please fall in love with me.
She obviously lives in your dreams, Aeolus.

options.text: Tell Aeolus the Truth About Moira

nodes.text: I talked about you to Lady Moira today.
You did? What did she say? Did she remember me?
She said that she thought you were sweet, but too young for her.
That's all she said... I'm sweet? She thinks I'm still a boy?
There goes the love of my life, lost forever.
You can always try talking to her yourself.
No... I was afraid all along that she wouldn't like me. I just was hoping against hope that I was wrong.
I talked about you to Lady Moira today.
You did? What did she say? Did she remember me?
She said that she thought that you were the cutest guy here at the school and that she would love to hear you sing about her.
I can't believe it! She likes me! She really likes me. I'll have to write her a new song to show how much I care. Thanks, Shawn, you're the best.
I talked about you to Lady Moira today.
You did? What did she say? Did she remember me?
Not only did she remember you - she was impressed by how you withstood the pain of your injury. She mentioned how sweet and kind you were. She could tell that you had a sensitive soul.
She was? She did? Oh, Shawn - isn't she an angel? My Angel of Mercy...
Thanks, Shawn. I knew I could count on you.

options.text: Lie that Moira Doesn't Like Aeolus

nodes.text: I talked about you to Lady Moira today.
You did? What did she say? Did she remember me?
I'm afraid that when I brought up your name, Lady Moira didn't know who you were until I described your unusual looks. Then she said that she thought you were very strange.
I tried to tell her that you were a nice guy, but I'm afraid you are just too weird for her.
I was afraid that she'd feel that way. Thanks.

options.text: Tell the Truth that You Haven't Talked to Moira

nodes.text: I didn't get in to see Moira today. I'll try to get to it tomorrow.
Please do. Then you, too, can see how lovely and sweet she is.
So what do you think of Lady Moira now?
I couldn't have fallen in love with a more beautiful or wonderful person than Moira.

options.text: Bring Up Sophia to be Snarky

nodes.text: I thought that Sophia was your one and only true love...
I deluded myself that I could fall in love with someone just because she was good-looking. Moira is nothing like Sophia.
Moira is sweet and loving.
You really need to go talk with her tomorrow and show her how you feel about her.
I know I do... I can't wait to serenade her with my songs about her.
Try not to hum all night this time.
Sorry, when I've got a song in my heart, there's a hum on my lips. I'll try to hum under my breath tonight.
Good night, Aeolus.
The love of my life does not love me. Nothing will ever be good again.
